about_the_game:
This is a game with elements of simplistic roguelike and minimalistic gameplay. You as a squad leader will have to crush the brave heroes of the opposite sex and get a worthy reward.



Choosing from several options you complete your squad and go into the thick of battle. It won't be easy to win, but with each new attempt you improve the characteristics of your warriors and try again and again until you get what you want.



Try different variants, find tactics that will be most effective, increase the skills of your warriors, and get the victory and with it the full power over your captive.




IN THIS ADVENTURE AWAITS YOU:
70 detailed images
40 explicit animations of high quality
7 goddesses ready to fight back
5 variants of mobs with the ability to improve their characteristics
Many variants of playthrough
Tense battles and much more tense endings


In ancient times, when the stars wove their mysterious weaves in the heavens and the world was ruled by the Gods, the planet Jupiter shone in all its majestic beauty. A mighty Emperor ruled on its throne, and his alliance with the majestic Empress dictated the terms of the entire solar system. But even the most powerful have their secret desires, and in the Emperor's heart lurked an unfathomable longing for an heir who would continue their glory.

But fate, like the wind, waved its caprices, and for many years their house remained without an heir. Nature was generous to them only in giving them daughters, of whom they had six, and sons she withheld in her inscrutable plans. Like a curse, this darkened the Emperor's heart. And, in this endless dance of fate, one single decision changed everything. While travelling through the vast cosmos, the Emperor, enveloped in the magic of Earth, fell in love with a beautiful Earthling. From this forbidden love, a son was born, illegitimate, but imbued with the light of the stars... Half-god, half-man... And he grew up realising his greatness and destiny - to become the ruler of the Earth and support its prosperity.

The years passed. Old age engulfed the Supreme Emperor. On the verge between life and death, when his breath was fading and his soul was preparing for its final flight across the starry expanses, he called his faithful wife to him. And lying on his deathbed, with trembling in his heart and with his last strength he told her the secret that lay in the depths of his soul like a heavy burden. His words, like daggers, pierced the heart of the empress when he told her of the son born on Earth and left to him all these years as a secret message.

As there was no legitimate heir, the Emperor's last will was to divide his possessions among all his daughters. Each of them received a planet, while the Earth, his son's homeworld, the Emperor bequeathed to him. The stately farewell declaration, however, was overshadowed by the vengeful shadow of the empress, whose heart was overflowing with jealousy and envy. Immediately, after the death of her husband, she gave orders to wipe out the trace of her illegitimate son. However, he managed to escape, but at what cost, in the abyss of ruthless circumstances, he lost everything he valued and everyone he loved.

Abandoned by the ruling hands, the Earth turned into an arena of endless battle, where people in an insatiable thirst for power and wealth destroyed each other. Where in the captivity of bloodthirsty passion and recklessness, lust and debauchery blossomed like a storm, violently tearing hearts and minds. Where whole continents languished in terrible hunger, while others luxuriated in abundant resources under unmerciful rulers. Where the power of the strong suppressed the weak, and the valley of world affairs rose on the crashing waves of injustice.

There the Emperor's illegitimate son grew stronger and older. Drenched in the blood of rebellion and burnt by the flames of endless rage. He was tormented by thoughts of vengeance. Like a majestic phoenix rising from the ashes, he defied the forces that had consumed the entire solar system.

content_descriptors.notes: All characters depicted in this game are adults. The game contains sexually explicit content intended for adults only. The game contains nudity, animated sexual acts without censorship, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM, violence, step siblings relationship.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Fallen Goddesses

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium G4560
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT440
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: The time has come. You will lead a squad of warriors to capture each goddess... Capture and punish her the way she deserves.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
